Fall in love with

homechoice blankets

From special celebrations like weddings and birthdays to everyday cosy comfort, a homechoice blanket makes every moment extraordinary.

More than a blanket

We offer a wide variety of textures to suit every touch.

Our super-soft homechoice blankets are a firm favourite and we offer a wide variety of textures to suit every touch.

Faux fur

Our homechoice faux fur blankets offer the ultimate luxury and comfort. These generous-sized blankets add beautiful warmth to any space with a premium-quality silky-soft finish that lasts for years.

Sherpa fleece

Set a cosy bedroom scene and cuddle under our sumptuously soft sherpa blankets. These superior quality homechoice blankets retain the same plush softness, wash after wash while adding a welcome warmth to your bed or couch.

Mink blankets

Create the cosiest retreat with homechoice mink blankets. Choose from a range of weights from 2 – 7kg in various colours and designs to wrap yourself in plush perfection to enjoy your best sleep ever.
